rejected.title: Rejected listings
rejected.description: These listings did not meet our requirements and have been rejected. You can edit the listing and resubmit or delete it.

accepted.title: Active listings
accepted.description: These listings are confirmed and visible to all users. You can edit or delete them at any time.

notPaid.title: Listings pending payment
notPaid.description: These listings require payment to become active. Click the "Pay" button to complete the payment process and publish your listing. Publishing a listing costs 1 euro.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete this listing?
deleteDialog.description: After removing the listing, it cannot be restored.
